sentences.en: Do you have a physiology class on Tuesday afternoon?

sentences.en: He continued to use chicks in studies of various facets of nutrition and physiology.
sentences.cn: 他继续用鸡研究各种营养因素和生理学.

sentences.en: He was awarded the Nobel Prize for achievements in physiology.

sentences.en: His new contribution to the advancement of physiology was well appreciated.
sentences.cn: 他对生理学发展的新贡献获得高度赞赏.

sentences.cn: 她对生理学这门学科了如指掌.

sentences.en: The resulting " biochips " are used to study the physiology inside cells involved in diseases.
